author: Victoria Hernandez
title: Hip Hop Celebrates Valentine's Day 2017 | HipHopDX
text:
Hip Hop Celebrates Valentine's Day 2017 February 14, 2017 | 4:50 PM 0 
Love was in the air this Valentine‚Äôs Day as many rappers took to social media to celebrate the day. Several posts were special tributes to a significant other, while some chose to honor their day ones, their mother or their kids. And Big Sean decided to do both. 
Those who are presumably single ‚Äî Nicki Minaj ‚Äî still shared in the joy wishing love and happiness to their followers. Meanwhile, her ex-boyfriend, Meek Mill , chose to make a joke about what he was doing on the sometimes-dreaded holiday. 
Check out the top songs released today in the DX Digest and keep scrolling to see the best Valentine‚Äôs Day posts below.
